sales_invoice.description: This table contains information about invoices generated for orders

data.description: The primary key of the table, unique identifier for each invoice.
Identifier for the order to which this invoice is associated.
Identifier for the store where the order was placed.
Unique sequential invoice identifier.
Grand total of the invoice.
Base grand total of the invoice.
Tax amount for shipping on the invoice.
Base tax amount for shipping on the invoice.
Tax amount for the invoice.
Base tax amount for the invoice.
Shipping amount for the invoice.
Base shipping amount for the invoice.
Subtotal of the invoice.
Base subtotal of the invoice.
Discount amount applied to the invoice.
Base discount amount applied to the invoice.
Date and time when the invoice was created.
Date and time when the invoice was last updated.
Unique identifier for the invoice.
Identifier for the customer who placed the order.
Name of the customer who placed the order.
Email address of the customer who placed the order.
Identifier for the billing address associated with the invoice.
Identifier for the shipping address associated with the invoice.
The status of the invoice (e.g., pending, paid, canceled).
The state of the invoice (e.g., new, processing, closed).
Base currency code for the invoice.
Currency code for the order associated with the invoice.
Currency code for the store where the order was placed.
Label for the status of the invoice.
Label for the state of the invoice.
Collection of items included in the invoice.
